rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Data Probe attachment complete.
Beginning start-up prep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0002
rows.name: Thank you, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0003
rows.name: This cylindrical machine is the Data Probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0004
rows.name:
It's made to advance while dissolving the soil
by irradiating a laser from its tip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
At first, we installed them on the surface.
But destruction by native creatures occurred frequently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
They were modified into the current design
that gets installed deep underground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0007
rows.name: How is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Prep complete!
Ready when you are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0009
rows.name:
The signal for installation is done from the [System:Ruby rt=Device ]terminal[/System:Ruby].
Try doing it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0010
rows.name: Interest

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0011
rows.name: Show interest and launch the probe.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0020
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look at Lin and ask her to do the installation

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0010
rows.name: Eh!? Me??[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0011
rows.name:
No way!
Then it wouldn't be training, would it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
There's nothing scary about it at all,
so just push the button![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0026
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0027
rows.name: Nod and operate the terminal.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0028
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0022
rows.name: Look at Elma and shake head.

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0013
rows.name:
You're already a member of BLADE.
How are you going to manage if you get scared by something like this?[ST:wait

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0030
rows.name: Decision

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0031
rows.name: Make up your mind and operate the terminal.

rows.label: xs02040100_JNK0032
rows.name: Determination

rows.label: xs02040100_SEL0033
rows.name: With renewed resolve, operate the terminal.

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0014
rows.name: Now we just wait for it to reach the target depth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0015
rows.name: Data Probe activation confirmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Connection to FrontierNet
is proceeding normally, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hmm, well done.
Remember how you did that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0018
rows.name: FrontierNet Spots are designated to collect information efficiently at fixed intervals.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0019
rows.name: In order to discover the Life Point[ST:wide ]â€•[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0020
rows.name:
we need to install Data Probes
over a wide area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0021
rows.name:
When you find FrontierNet Spots,
keep installing probes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02040100_MSG0026
rows.name:
That's it for the training.
Let's head back to the BLADE Home and report to Nagi.[ST:wait ]
